changelog: v1.5.6: BugWatcher CI monitoring — GitHub Actions integration, auto-diagnosis of CI failures, regression detection, ci_watcher.jsonl log.
changes: NEW: BugWatcher GitHub Actions CI monitoring — polls Actions API every 5 min for failed runs
NEW: CI_KNOWN_ISSUES — 5 patterns: NSIS PATH regression, missing deps, test failures, PyInstaller errors, checkout failures
NEW: ci_watcher.jsonl — dedicated log for all CI events (diagnosed, escalated, regression_detected, undiagnosed)
NEW: --ci flag for single CI poll cycle (useful for manual diagnosis runs)
UPD: Daily summary now includes ci.diagnosed / ci.regressions / ci.undiagnosed counts
UPD: GITHUB_TOKEN read from environment (auto-available in GitHub Actions CI)
